response.overview: Based on a true story that unfolded in Southern Arizona. In 2018, Randy and Marcella Heiss came across a balloon on the side of the road that had a ribbon on it. It popped, but inside was a Christmas list written in spanish. The Christmas wish list included things like clothes, art supplies, and a casa Enchantimals. The couple eventually found the person who wrote the list by the name of Dáyami. Mattel also reached out to the couple and was able to give them what was on the list to give to Dáyami.
response.title: Christmas Balloon
